entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [mono][hotreload] Add instance field #93036
    8.0.0
  • HttpListenerRequest.UserAgent should be attributed as nullable #93033
  • Make runtime more friendly to Kubernetes and container systems in general #93030
    9.0.0
  • Reduce the number of thread requests further in the thread pool and from async IO completion dispatchers #93028
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT tests failing when to compile `aot-instances.dll.bc` when using `-O0` #93023
  • JIT: Flow Graph Modernization and Improved Block Layout #93020
    9.0.0
  • `.NET 9.0` Native Trace Instrumentation Support for HttpClient as per OTel specification #93019
  • [release/8.0] Wrong architecture libc++ bundled with wasm cross-compilers on linux-arm64 #93015
    8.0.0
  • ReflectionTypeLoadException when interface is loaded from different locations #93013
  • release/8.0 branch doesn't build with .NET 8 RC1 #93011
    8.0.0
  • [mono][net7] Cherrypick fixes to build runtime with Xcode 15 #93009
    7.0.x
  • ILLink fails to resolve method's base interface method if the interface method doesn't have newslot #93008
  • DllImport on Linux ignoring an already loaded module #92995
  • jitstress failing widely with NRE #92990
    9.0.0

Closed

  • System.Private.Corelib R2R PDB is not included in runtime pack #92456
    8.0.0
  • JIT Arm64: Incorrectly optimizes out narrowing #92865
    8.0.0
  • `System.Reflection` - `Type.GetCustomAttributes` Unexpected Attribute Count behavior #88473
    Future
  • Remove the `_obj` suffix on our CMake targets and remove the "interface" targets now that `target_link_libraries` can link to object libraries. #92787
    9.0.0
  • IndentedTextWriter doesn't use indentation on the first line. #92039
    Future
  • Failing on OSX - System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.TestCheckChildProcessUserAndGroupIds #93024
  • Follow up to CBOR date handling fix #92595
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerClosesOutboundControlStream_ClientClosesConnection - Status code: Unknown (0xdde6f334) #75270
    9.0.0
  • Selected apphost is not a valid PE file on s390x #92344
    8.0.0
  • Missing Microsoft.Extensions.* package README files #92963
  • MulticastInterface_Set_IPv6_Loopback_Succeeds doesn't #92622
  • Request for Manual Object Release Method in C# #93007
  • [mono] Fuse Vector128.WithElement and Vector128.GetElement on arm64 #85166
    Future
  • [QUIC] Split out MsQuic configuration from connection #42642
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'hwintrinsicChild->isContained()' #90508
    8.0.0
  • What really defines the result of typeof(MyType).GetHashCode()? #92973
  • .Net 8 RC1 Regression: error BLAZORSDK1001: Unable to find '{dll list}' to be lazy loaded later. Confirm that project or package references are included and the reference is used in the project. #92965
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][hotreload] Generate seq_points if we don't have pdb information from HotReload #93039
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Split the MarshalAsParser into two classes #93038
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Added 'standalone' option when building tests for ilasm roundtrip #93037
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][hotreload] Adding test case failing #93035
    needs-area-label
  • Remove the MarshallingGeneratorFactoryKey type and construct the generator factory during the "source emit" stage #93034
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Make BasicBlock::bbPrev and bbNext private #93032
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][workloads] Allow overriding the current version #93031
    area-Build-mono
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Sigmoid and TensorPrimitives.SoftMax #93029
    area-System.Numerics
  • Try to resolve x64 libc++ being included with linux-arm64 #93027
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] WBT: Avoid using `-O0` in tests #93026
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Change SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException server to Loopback #93025
    area-System.Net.Http
  • System.Formats.Cbor package's readme #93021
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #93014
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix conflicting test assembly name in classloader tests #93012
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser] drop `create_task_callback` #93010
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Race in init_method when using LLVM AOT. #93006
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Fix invalid smnegl transformation #93003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Internal memcpy uses SIMD #93002
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] streaming compile wasm bit earlier #93000
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add ordering side effects in fgMorphExpandInstanceField #92998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try rooting less stuff for reflectable method signatures #92994
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Export debug helpers #92993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [6.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92988
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92987
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • [8.0] Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92986
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Make thread pool thread timeouts configurable #92985
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Don't widen to Int128 in CastCache #92984
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove ActiveIssue on HostFactoryResolver tests #92983
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #92980
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #92979
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.24

Merged

  • Merge CoreCLR-based official builds legs into one leg per platform #92901
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Replace CMake Object Interfaces with CMake 3.20 Objects #92966
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • IndentedTextWriter doesn't use indentation on the first line #92791
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Exp #93018
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/8.0] CI: runtime-wasm-perf: disable for PRs #92977
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix the path for crossgen2 for the outerloop cg2 legs #92971
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Consolidate some TensorPrimitivesTests logic around special values #92982
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [release/8.0] Use invariant culture in CBOR date encoding #92924
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Cbor, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup iOS scenarios post HybridGlobalization scenario addition #92904
    area-Infrastructure
  • SPMI: Fix superpmi.py result assert #92997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fuse SIMD extract and insert on arm64 #92714
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix duplicate file name generated by GenerateHWIntrinsicTests_General.cs #92954
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix zero/sign extend casts on arm64 #92875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix typo in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TraceSource PACKAGE.md #92989
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fix issue with reflection invoke and pointer types #92922
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Throw when applying `JsonObjectHandling.Populate` to types with parameterized constructors. #92947
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Update branding to 7.0.13 #92970
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Make BasicBlock::bbJumpKind private #92908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] CI: runtime-wasm-perf: disable for PRs #92978
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update branding to 6.0.24 #92969
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.24

Updated

  • Merge tests under tracing / Reflection / ReadyToRun / Regressions #92029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use `add_linker_options` and `target_linker_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] WBT inner loop improvements #92968
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Create IL-RT folder to store roundtripped IL assemblies and sources, removed suffix '.asm' to roundtripped files, re-enabled rejit ilasm roundtripping #90110
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Entitle macOS executables while building #92967
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Allow experimenting with different CSE subsets #92918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #92579
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Support specifying multiple directories through SSL_CERT_DIR. #92920
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Implement LoadVector64x* and LoadVector128x* APIs #92855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #92864
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • HashSet.UnionWith preformance improvement #92300
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Define `getWasmIndirectFunctionTable` before initializing the #92683
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • `readonly`-ify fields based on whole program view #92923
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Manually update release/8.0 arcade to latest #92778
    Servicing-approved, blocking-release, area-codeflow
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement japanese calendar data #92471
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Apple mobile template allows passing process arguments to the runtime #92772
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement overrides for Span and ReadOnlySpan on SslStream #92889
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono][interp] Fix calling of static delegates with simd arguments #92927
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Merged stores: Fix alignment-related issues and enable SIMD where possible #92939
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • CBOR Writer: Use canonical NaN representation for NaN values #92934
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Fix linux-x64 AOT-llvm perf job #92644
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
